name: places/ChIJI0cMP_VZwokRn8osaUomOJc
formattedAddress: 32 Ericsson Pl, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 32 Ericsson Pl, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I don’t recommend seeing Dr Lorenz if you are suffering from topical steroid withdrawal. He is not informed about TSW. He asked me if I got my information about my condition from the internet. Prior to seeing Dr Lorenz, I was diagnosed with TSW by a doctor in NJ. I am also a registered health care provider licensed in New York. I am not a kid googling random things. Throughout the past 3.5 years, I have seen 4 different doctors who supported me through this horrendous medical condition. In the future I will making the trip to NJ if I need a derm. More and more people are suffering with TSW; it’s a good idea to learn about the condition and be kind because we are suffering in a way that many cannot imagine. We don’t need the passive aggressive & condescending comments. I also got a surprise bill from a lab from a swab test I got at the office. Although a receptionist said this isn’t their responsibility, it would be courteous & take minutes to inform someone that they may be getting a bill after a swab test. As soon as you walk into the office there’s a strong fragrance smell, inappropriate for those with allergies and sensitive skin. Office prioritizes aesthetics. Doctors and employees at doctors’ offices should be kind.

originalText.text: Came in for an annual checkup and Dr Lorenz was very friendly and knowledgeable. I was in and out in 30 minutes and had all my questions answered and prescriptions filled. The office was very nice and clean. Great experience!

text.text: Came in for an annual checkup and Dr Lorenz was very friendly and knowledgeable. I was in and out in 30 minutes and had all my questions answered and prescriptions filled. The office was very nice and clean. Great experience!

originalText.text: I came in to deal with a concerning dark spot and Dr Lorenz  was very good at communicating my treatment options and resolved the issue with one treatment. He was very thorough and friendly and I will be returning.

text.text: I came in to deal with a concerning dark spot and Dr Lorenz  was very good at communicating my treatment options and resolved the issue with one treatment. He was very thorough and friendly and I will be returning.

originalText.text: Had my first appointment with Dr. Glodny. I was seen at the time of my appointment with no waiting. The office was clean and modern. Office staff was all friendly. Dr. Glodny took time to answer all of my questions and address all of my concerns. He was very professional and did not make me feel like the appointment was rushed at all which is very rare in Manhattan.
